channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Five Star Restaurant Reservations – WordPress Booking Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Five Star Restaurant Reservations – WordPress Booking Plugin

item.title: CVE-2021-24965|2024-08-03T19:49:14.377Z -- unknown -- five%20star%20restaurant%20reservations%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20booking%20plugin
item.description: The Five Star Restaurant Reservations WordPress plugin before 2.4.8 does not have capability and CSRF checks in the rtb_welcome_set_schedule AJAX action, allowing any authenticated users to call it. Due to the lack of sanitisation and escaping, users with a role as low as subscriber could perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks against logged in admins
